So sprach Malte S. Stretz am 2002-07-21 um 01:56:18 +0200 :
> Not really. In most cases it's an install-and-forget. But there're some 
> special cases like you. Be proud! You're special :o)

Uhm, yes, I'm happy that it doesn't work for me ;))

> I had a look at the spamc source and put a printf everywhere an exit code 74 
> is used; could you have a try with the attached spamc, please?

read_message->old_serverex 74

host:~/.cpan/build/Mail-SpamAssassin-2.31 # telnet localhost 783
Trying 127.0.0.1...
Connected to localhost.
Escape character is '^]'.
df
SPAMD/1.0 76 Bad header line: df
Connection closed by foreign host.

Just like John just said - thanks a lot for taking all that time to help
me get SA to work!  I'm *REALLY* thankful for this!
